TopicTitle: Hot Keys Detected While typing in text field

Articles.Content: When typing a name to save a rocket design I was gonna name it "RAM Booster"  but the game detects the M as the hot key to the Map and exits me out of the save field into the map, making it impossible name things with assigned hot key letters.

Confirm this!!  Trying to make a "Mun Rocket" ... kept popping out to the Map view.

Additionally while on a planetary body and planting a flag...God help you if you use punctuation.  All of a sudden I was at 1000x speed because I used a few periods in my flag note.

3 minutes ago, skogs said:

Why do I keep seeing reports of KSP1 long time oddities in a new rewrite?  Not the flag requester per se, but the raw keyboard reading sprinkled through KSP1 has been a long chided newbie dev error.   Hmmm
